message: All metadata fields for the indicator 5-a-1, translated into en
data: Goal 5. Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls5.a Undertake reforms to give women equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to ownership and control of land and other forms of property, financial services, inheritance and resources natural, in compliance with internal legislation5.a.1.Proportion of the total agricultural population with property rights or guaranteed rights to agricultural land, by sex; b) proportion of women among the holders of property rights or guaranteed rights over agricultural land, by type of rightIt is the percentage of the agricultural population with property rights or guaranteed rights to agricultural land in relation to the total population according to the age group considered.%Agricultural population with property rights or guaranteed rights to agricultural land divided by the total population according to the age group considered, multiplied by 100.Not available
